src:
Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Angkat Koper di Awal
05 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Danang Sundoro



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Angkat Koper di Awal



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Angkat Koper di Awal


KBRN, Fuzhou : Pebulutangkis Tunggal Putra Indonesia, Anthony Sinisuka Ginting harus mengakui ketangguhan pebulutangkis  Hong Kong, Ng Ka Long Angus pada pertandingan babak pertama Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019, dengan skor 21-18, 21-9 dalam tempo 39 menit di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Selasa (5/11/2019).Sempat unggul 14-10 di game pertama, perolehan angka Anthony tersusul oleh Ng, kedudukan menjadi imbang 16-16. Ng yang terus bermain menekan, tidak mampu memberikan kesempatan pada Anthony, ia pun mengamankan game pertama. Pada game kedua, Anthony tidak dapat berbuat banyak. “Saya banyak memberikan pengembalian yang sudah diantisipasi dia. Pengembalian saya justru menguntungkan buat lawan. Waktu dia balik memimpin, dia jadi tambah percaya diri,” jelas Anthony dalam keterangan tertulis yang diterima Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI) dari rilis PP.PBSI, Selasa (05/11/2019).Ketika ditanya soal minimnya persiapan dan menurunnya stamina usai mengikuti dua turnamen beruntun di Eropa pada pekan lalu, Anthony mengatakan bahwa memang ada pengaruh baginya.  “Pengaruh ada, tapi kan semua pemain juga pasti merasakan,” kata Anthony. “Ketemu Ng memang ramai terus, di dua pertemuan terkahir juga saya kalah. Saya sudah tanya sama Vito (Shesar Hiren Rhustavito) bagaimana caranya menghadapi Ng, sekilas ada gambaran. Tapi saya tidak bisa menerapkan dengan baik di pertandingan tadi, saya juga nggak bisa jaga poin,” ungkap Anthony. “Di saat-saat kritis, saat poinnya imbang sama lawan, saya tidak bisa konsisten di saat seperti ini,” lanjutnya. Inilah catatan selama sepuluh kali pertemuan yang telah dijalani Anthony melawan tunggal putra asal Hong Kong, Ng Ka Long Angus berakhir dengan skor 3-7.Indonesia masih memiliki tiga wakil tersisa di tunggal putra melalui Jonatan Christie, Shesar Hiren Rhustavito, dan Tommy Sugiarto yang baru akan bertanding esok hari, Rabu (6/11/2019).
text:
Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Lifts a Suitcase at the Beginning
05 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Danang Sundoro



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Lifts a Suitcase at the Beginning



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Ginting Lifts a Suitcase at the Beginning


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian Men's Singles Badminton Player, Anthony Sinisuka Ginting must recognize the toughness of Hong Kong's badminton player, Ng Ka Long Angus in the first round match of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament, with a score of 21-18, 21-9 within 39 minutes at Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Tuesday (11/5/2019). A place leading 14-10 in the first game, the acquisition of Anthony's figure was overtaken by Ng, the position became a draw 16-16. Ng, who continued to play pressing, was unable to give Anthony a chance, he also secured the first game. In the second game, Anthony could not do much. "I gave a lot of returns that he had anticipated. My return is actually beneficial for the opponent. When he returned to lead, he became more confident, "explained Anthony in a written statement received by Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI) from the PP. PBBSI release, Tuesday (05/11/2019). When asked about the lack of preparation and decreased stamina after following two consecutive tournaments in Europe last week, Anthony said that there was indeed an influence for him. "Influence exists, but all players also feel it," Anthony said. "I found Ng always busy, at the last two meetings I also lost. I have asked Vito (Shesar Hiren Rhustavito) how to deal with Ng, at first glance there is a picture. But I could not apply well in the match earlier, I also could not keep the points, "said Anthony. "In critical times, when the points are equal with opponents, I cannot be consistent at times like this," he continued. This is the record during the ten meetings that Anthony has undertaken against men's singles from Hong Kong, Ng Ka Long Angus ended with a score of 3-7. Indonesia still has three representatives remaining in the men's singles through Jonatan Christie, Shesar Hiren Rhustavito, and the new Tommy Sugiarto will compete tomorrow, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
